metadata.title: USN-4079-2 -- SoX vulnerabilities
metadata.description: USN-4079-1 fixed vulnerabilities in SoX. This update provides the corresponding update for Ubuntu 18.04 LTS and Ubuntu 19.04.  Original advisory details:   It was discovered that SoX incorrectly handled certain MP3 files. An attacker  could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service. (CVE-2019-8354,  CVE-2019-8355, CVE-2019-8356, CVE-2019-8357)  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4079-2` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libsox-fmt-base - 14.4.2-3ubuntu0.18.04.1 libsox-fmt-pulse - 14.4.2-3ubuntu0.18.04.1 libsox-fmt-ao - 14.4.2-3ubuntu0.18.04.1 libsox-dev - 14.4.2-3ubuntu0.18.04.1 libsox3 - 14.4.2-3ubuntu0.18.04.1 libsox-fmt-mp3 - 14.4.2-3ubuntu0.18.04.1 libsox-fmt-all - 14.4.2-3ubuntu0.18.04.1 sox - 14.4.2-3ubuntu0.18.04.1 libsox-fmt-alsa - 14.4.2-3ubuntu0.18.04.1 libsox-fmt-oss - 14.4.2-3ubuntu0.18.04.1 No subscription required
